Image Carousel Using a Line

Note: this example may appear blank if you are using MacOS or have an older GPU.

Arranging instances presents an interesting challenge, especially in the use case of image carousels or photo slide-shows. In this example we look at how we might arrange images as a gallery that stretches along a line. Here the same line thatâ€™s used for the instances also describes the path for our camera COMP. You could similarly transform the geometry left and right to achieve the same effect.
